creator: newmanj@bsci.com
text:
I am using poi-1.10. When I create a spreadsheet and attempt to open it in 
Excel 97 SR2. I am getting an out of memory from excel. Has anyone seen this or 
know what causes it? I thank you in advance

creator: avik@apache.org
text:
Please ask questions on the list, not in bugzilla. But in general poi needs a
bit of memory for large files. Increase the memory available to the JVM
